#Text=Super Bowl 50 : Denver Broncos defeat Carolina Panthers 24 – 10
#Text=Von Miller , the Super Bowl 50 MVP .
#Text=Image : Jeffrey Beall .
#Text=Tuesday , February 9 , 2016
#Text=On Sunday , the Denver Broncos defeated the Carolina Panthers in Super Bowl 50 by a score of 24 – 10 .
#Text=The game , played at Levi 's Stadium in Santa Clara , California in front of 71,088 spectators , marked the Broncos ' third Super Bowl victory and their first since 1999 .
#Text=Entering the game , the Panthers had lost only once in the 2015 NFL season , while the Broncos won 12 of their 16 games .
#Text=The Panthers kicked off to start the game , and the Broncos scored first with Brandon McManus ' 34-yard field goal .

#Text=After both teams exchanged punts , the Broncos scored again when linebacker Von Miller stripped the ball from Cam Newton , forcing him to fumble , and the ball was recovered by Malik Jackson in the endzone to result in a Denver touchdown .
#Text=In the second quarter , the Panthers scored a touchdown when running back Jonathan Stewart jumped over the goal line .
#Text=The two teams punted again on their next drives .

#Text=The second turnover of the game occurred when Bronco Darian Stewart forced Mike Tolbert to fumble , with Danny Trevathan recovering ; however , the Broncos failed to capitalize when Peyton Manning was intercepted by Kony Ealy .
#Text=The half ended with the Broncos leading 13 – 7 .
#Text=In the second half , the Panthers had a chance to narrow the margin to three points , but kicker Graham Gano 's 44-yard field goal attempt hit the goal post 's right upright .
#Text=Afterwards , Denver increased the score with McManus kicking a 30-yard field goal .
#Text=On the next series , Newton led the Panthers ' offense to the Broncos ' 28-yard line , but was intercepted by T. J. Ward .
#Text=Denver and Carolina both subsequently punted .
#Text=Afterwards , Manning was sacked by Ealy and fumbled ; Carolina took advantage with Gano 's 39-yard kick to make the score 16 – 10 .
#Text=Unfortunately for the Panthers , Miller forced Newton to fumble at the Panthers ' four-yard line and Ward recovered .
#Text=With 3:08 left in the game , Denver 's C. J. Anderson sealed the game with a two-yard touchdown run , followed by Manning 's two-point conversion to Bennie Fowler .
#Text=Miller ended the game with six tackles , 2.5 sacks and two forced fumbles and was awarded the Super Bowl Most Valuable Player Award .

#Text=Manning , who is the oldest quarterback to start a Super Bowl at the age of 39 and is rumored to have played his final game in the National Football League , completed 13 of 23 passes for 141 yards with an interception and a lost fumble .
#Text=The Broncos recorded only 194 yards , the fewest by a Super Bowl winner .
#Text=The game 's festivities featured Lady Gaga performing the national anthem .
#Text=After the second quarter , Coldplay performed the Super Bowl 50 halftime show with former Super Bowl performers Bruno Mars and Beyoncé .
#Text=Coldplay opened the show with " Viva la Vida " and " Paradise " , followed by a performance of " Uptown Funk " with Mars .
#Text=Afterwards , Beyoncé performed her new song " Formation " and joined Coldplay and Mars on stage to end the show .
